showcase.items.0.title: Check-in Page - Click to start automatic refresh scanning
showcase.items.1.title: Login - Data saved locally, or register and login
showcase.items.2.title: Statistics Page - View daily project analysis across all dimensions
showcase.items.3.title: Settings Page - Configure scan interval and off-work reminder time
showcase.items.4.title: Reminder - Daily work summary reminder at scheduled time
showcase.items.5.title: Dashboard - View project data with various charts and metrics
showcase.items.6.title: Analytics Page - Track work changes across different dimensions
showcase.items.7.title: Email Sync - Enable daily email reminders
showcase.items.8.title: Emergency Contact - Notify emergency contact when work hours drop below threshold
